testcase.classname: Searches for multi products in amazon webpage
testcase.name: TC02 User should be able to search for products in amazon
testcase.system-out: Given User goes amazon webpage..............................................passed And User searches for Nutella...............................................passed Then Test that resultText has Nutella in it.................................passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed And User searches for Samsung...............................................passed And Test that resultText has Samsung in it..................................passed And User closes the page....................................................passed And User searches for Apple.................................................passed And Test that resultText has Apple in it....................................passed

testcase.classname: US1003 User searches for the product which is entered as an parameter
testcase.name: TC03 User searches for Nutella with parameter
testcase.system-out: Given User goes amazon webpage..............................................passed Then User searches for "Nutella"............................................passed And Test that resultText has "Nutella" in it................................passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed

testcase.classname: US1003 User searches for the product which is entered as an parameter
testcase.name: TC05 User searches for Cucumber with parameter
testcase.system-out: Given User goes amazon webpage..............................................passed And User searches for "Cucumber"............................................passed Then Test that resultText has "Cucumber" in it..............................passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed

testcase.classname: US1006 User should be able to login with valid data
testcase.name: TC12 With valid username and password User should be able to login
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "qdUrl" webpage.............................................passed When User clicks on homepage LoginButton....................................passed And User will enter an "qdValidEmail" to email box..........................passed And User will enter a "qdValidPassword" to password box.....................passed And User will click on loginPage LoginButton................................passed Then Test that User can see MyCourse link...................................passed And User closes the page....................................................passed

testcase.name: TC19 User tests buttons by waiting
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "heroUrl" webpage...........................................passed When Click the Add Element button...........................................passed And Wait until the Delete button is visible.................................passed Then Test that the Delete button is visible.................................passed And Delete the button by pressing the Delete button.........................passed Then Test that the delete button is not visible.............................passed And User closes the page....................................................passed
